channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- WP DS Blog Map
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- WP DS Blog Map

item.title: CVE-2022-2425|2024-08-03T00:39:07.629Z -- unknown -- wp%20ds%20blog%20map
item.description: The WP DS Blog Map WordPress plugin through 3.1.3 does not sanitise and escape some of its settings, which could allow high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting attacks when the unfiltered_html capability is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
